name: User Experience
description: Configuration how users are given experience.

enableExperience.name: Enable Experience
enableExperience.description: Reward with experience when users send messages on your server.

baseXpPerChar.name: Experience Per Character/Word
baseXpPerChar.description: Base amount of experience given per character/word in a message. This is multiplied by the length of the message.

maxMessageLength.name: Max Message Length
maxMessageLength.description: Maximum length of a message to calculate experience from. Messages longer than this will be truncated.

startingXPRequirement.name: Starting XP Requirement
startingXPRequirement.description: Amount of experience required to reach level 1. This is the base requirement for the first level.

nextLevelXPRequirement.name: Next Level XP Requirement
nextLevelXPRequirement.description: Amount of experience required to reach the next level. This is multiplied by the user's current level requirement.

addExperienceMultiplier.name: Add Experience Multiplier
addExperienceMultiplier.description: If true, multipliers will be added. If false, it will use the heights multiplier.

enableLevelUpMessage.name: Enable Level Up Message
enableLevelUpMessage.description: If true, a level up message will be sent to the user when they level up.

levelUpMessage.name: Level Up Message
levelUpMessage.description: Message sent to the user when they level up. Use {user} to mention the user and {level} to show their new level.

levelUpMessageChannel.name: Level Up Message Channel
levelUpMessageChannel.description: Channel ID where the level up message will be sent. Leave empty to send it in the same channel as the message.

experienceChannels.name: Experience Channels
experienceChannels.description: List of channel ID's that users are allowed to earn experience in. Leave empty to allow all channels.

boosterChannels.name: Booster Channels
boosterChannels.description: List of channel ID's that users earn extra experience in. Eg: 123456789012345678:10 where "123456789012345678" is the channel ID & "10" is the multiplier. Leave empty to disable.

boosterRoles.name: Booster Roles
boosterRoles.description: List of role ID's that users earn extra experience with. Eg: 123456789012345678:10 where "123456789012345678" is the role ID & "10" is the multiplier. Leave empty to disable.

boosterUsers.name: Booster Users
boosterUsers.description: List of user ID's that gives them extra experience. Eg: 123456789012345678:10 where "123456789012345678" is the user ID & "10" is the multiplier. Leave empty to disable.

levelRoles.name: Level Roles
levelRoles.description: List of role ID's that users earn for reaching a level.

replaceLevelRole.name: Replace Level Role
replaceLevelRole.description: If true, users will lose their previous level role when they gain a new one. If false, they will keep all level roles.
